origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.analyze_global_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of global economic factors on a specific commodity.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'commodity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The commodity to analyze, e.g., gold, oil.'}, {'name': 'economicFactor', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The economic factor to consider, e.g., global_stability, inflation.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'Analysis of the impact of the economic factor on the commodity.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.analyze_global_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'commodity'是'gold', 'economicFactor'是'global_stability'.
